faqs.question: What are the eligibility criteria for participating in the hackathon?
faqs.answer: The hackathon is open for teams of 3 or 4 members. There are no specific requirements in terms of technical expertise, as we welcome participants from diverse backgrounds, including designers, developers, and subject matter experts. The only prerequisite is a keen interest in exploring the potential of XR technologies.

faqs.question: What are the judging criteria for the hackathon?
faqs.answer: Projects will be evaluated based on criteria such as innovation, user experience, technical implementation, and potential impact. The judges will also consider factors like feasibility, scalability, and the overall creativity and originality of the project.

faqs.question: What are the prizes and recognition opportunities for winning teams or outstanding projects?
faqs.answer: The winning teams will receive attractive cash prizes, VR hardware, and a sponsored trip to the main physical event in New Delhi. Along with that, we will also provide sponsored trips to Global AR/VR conferences like MIT Reality Hack, AWE Asia, etc. All participants will receive certificates of participation, and outstanding projects may be featured during the WAVES event to pitch to investors.

faqs.question: How will the hackathon ensure diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunities for all participants?
faqs.answer: We are committed to creating an inclusive and welcoming environment for all participants. Our event will feature diverse mentors and judges who represent different backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We will also provide resources and support for participants with special needs or accessibility requirements. Throughout the hackathon, we will emphasize collaboration, mutual respect, and a spirit of learning and growth.

faqs.question: Will there be any workshops or mentoring sessions during the hackathon?
faqs.answer: Yes, there will be some workshops and mentoring sessions throughout the event. These sessions will cover topics such as XR design principles, development best practices, and business strategy. Participants will have the opportunity to learn from industry experts and receive guidance on their projects.

faqs.question: Who can I contact if I have additional questions or need assistance?
faqs.answer: If you have any additional questions or need assistance, you can reach out to the event organizers at xrcreatorhackathon@wavelaps.com. They will be happy to help you with any inquiries or concerns you may have.
